remap.inValue: BMS ClearFaults - Preconditions were not met or failed to verify command was sent. View ESS Events page for more details
remap.note: Bit 0 - BMS ClearFaults - Preconditions were not met or failed to verify command was sent. View ESS Events page for more details

ClearFaults.note: Alarm variable that is triggered if sending clear faults command is unsuccessful

remap.inValue: BMS CloseContactors - Preconditions were not met or failed to verify command was sent. View ESS Events page for more details
remap.note: Bit 1 - BMS CloseContactors - Preconditions were not met or failed to verify command was sent. View ESS Events page for more details

CloseContactors.note: Alarm variable that is triggered if sending close contactors command is unsuccessful

remap.note: Bit 0 - BMS CellTempDelta - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 1 - BMS CellVoltageDelta - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 2 - BMS DCCurrent - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 3 - BMS DCCurrent - Min Threshold Exceeded
Bit 4 - BMS DCVoltage - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 5 - BMS DCVoltage - Min Threshold Exceeded
Bit 6 - BMS MaxCellTemp - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 7 - BMS MaxCellVoltage - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 8 - BMS MinCellTemp - Min Threshold Exceeded
Bit 9 - BMS MinCellVoltage - Min Threshold Exceeded
Bit 10 - BMS NumRacksOnline - Min Threshold Exceeded
Bit 11 - BMS SOC - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 12 - BMS SOC - Min Threshold Exceeded
Bit 13 - BMS SOH - Min Threshold Exceeded

MonitorVarAlarm.note1: Contains last recently reported alarm from any monitoring variable
MonitorVarAlarm.note2: Useful for reporting alarm states to an external management system (e.g. Site Controller) or modifying the alarm message before it is reported on the UI

remap.inValue: BMS OpenContactors - Preconditions were not met or failed to verify command was sent. View ESS Events page for more details
remap.note: Bit 2 - BMS OpenContactors - Preconditions were not met or failed to verify command was sent. View ESS Events page for more details

OpenContactors.note: Alarm variable that is triggered if sending open contactors command is unsuccessful

remap.inValue: BMS VerifyCloseContactors - Command was sent, but the expected result was not observed before timeout
remap.note: Bit 3 - BMS VerifyCloseContactors - Command was sent, but the expected result was not observed before timeout

VerifyCloseContactors.note: Alarm variable that is triggered if the BMS failed to close contactors

remap.inValue: BMS VerifyOpenContactors - Command was sent, but the expected result was not observed before timeout
remap.note: Bit 4 - BMS VerifyOpenContactors - Command was sent, but the expected result was not observed before timeout

VerifyOpenContactors.note: Alarm variable that is triggered if the BMS failed to open contactors

clear_alarms.note1: When this variable is set to Clear, all alarm variables (defined in /alarms/##BMS_ID##) will be reset to the normal state (defined in /config/##BMS_ID##:NoAlarmMsg)
clear_alarms.note2: Also, all monitoring variables (defined in variable) will have their alarm/fault states reset

remap.inValue: Cooling Protection with Ambient Temperature above 55 C or below -40 C
remap.note: Bit 13 - BMS tms_2_cooling_mode_protection - Cooling Protection with Ambient Temperature above 55 C or below -40 C
Bit 0 - BMS CellTempDelta - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 1 - BMS CellVoltageDelta - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 2 - BMS DCCurrent - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 3 - BMS DCCurrent - Min Threshold Exceeded
Bit 4 - BMS DCVoltage - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 5 - BMS DCVoltage - Min Threshold Exceeded
Bit 6 - BMS MaxCellTemp - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 7 - BMS MaxCellVoltage - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 8 - BMS MinCellTemp - Min Threshold Exceeded
Bit 9 - BMS MinCellVoltage - Min Threshold Exceeded
Bit 10 - BMS NumRacksOnline - Min Threshold Exceeded
Bit 11 - BMS SOC - Max Threshold Exceeded
Bit 12 - BMS SOC - Min Threshold Exceeded
Bit 13 - BMS SOH - Min Threshold Exceeded

MonitorVarFault.note1: Contains last recently reported fault from any monitoring variable
MonitorVarFault.note2: Useful for reporting fault states to an external management system (e.g. Site Controller) or modifying the fault message before it is reported on the UI

remap.note: Bit 2 - BMS auxiliary_power_supply_state - Aux Power Lost

clear_faults.note1: When this variable is set to Clear, all fault variables (defined in /faults/##BMS_ID##) will be reset to the normal state (defined in /config/##BMS_ID##:NoFaultMsg)
clear_faults.note2: Also, all monitoring variables (defined in variable) will have their alarm/fault states reset

CellTempDelta.note: Also a monitoring variable that reports an alarm/fault for over cell temp delta conditions

CellVoltageDelta.note: Also a monitoring variable that reports an alarm/fault for over cell voltage delta conditions

ClearFaultsDone.note: When this variable is set, the alarm/fault bitfields will be set to 0 to clear all bits

CurrentBeforeStopIsOK.note: Set to true if the BMS DC current is within an acceptable level before stopping the PCS

DCCurrent.note: Also a monitoring variable that reports an alarm/fault for over/under current conditions

DCVoltage.note: Also a monitoring variable that reports an alarm/fault for over/under voltage conditions

FaultShutdown.note: When the BMS instance faults, the fault shutdown event will be propagated to its parent

HeartbeatRead.note: Also a monitoring variable that reports an alarm/fault if ESS Controller loses communications with BMS

MaxCellTemp.note: Also a monitoring variable that reports an alarm/fault for over max cell temperature conditions

MaxCellVoltage.note: Also a monitoring variable that reports an alarm/fault for over max cell voltage conditions

MinCellTemp.note: Also a monitoring variable that reports an alarm/fault for under min cell temperature conditions

MinCellVoltage.note: Also a monitoring variable that reports an alarm/fault for under min cell voltage conditions

NumRacksOnline.note1: Also a monitoring variable that reports an alarm/fault for under num instances condition
NumRacksOnline.note2: TODO: Update min alarm/fault/reset thresholds and timeouts
NumRacksOnline.note3: TODO: Decode or calculate num instances online and remap/link value to this variable

OverCurrentAlarm.note: Adjusts the max alarm and reset thresholds for BMS DC current monitoring variable depending on the discharge current limit

OverCurrentFault.note: Adjusts the max fault threshold for BMS DC current monitoring variable depending on the discharge current limit

SOC.note: Also a monitoring variable that reports an alarm/fault for over/under soc conditions

SOH.note: Also a monitoring variable that reports an alarm/fault for under soh conditions

UnderCurrentAlarm.note: Adjusts the min alarm and reset thresholds for BMS DC current monitoring variable depending on the charge current limit

UnderCurrentFault.note: Adjusts the min fault threshold for BMS DC current monitoring variable depending on the charge current limit
